# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an options structure.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: String)
```

## Creating an options structure

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an options structure with the specified raw value.

items.description: Creates an options structure with the specified raw value.
items.name: init(rawValue:)
